00014 #include "fir.h"
00015 #include "support.h"
00016 #include <algorithm> 
00017 
00018 #include "fft.h"
00019 
00020 FIR::FIR(int taps, double bandwidth, double center) :
00021     m_taps(taps), m_bandWidth(bandwidth), m_centerFreq(center) {
00022     if(taps < 3) taps = 2;
00023     taps = taps/2;
00024 
00025     int taplen = 2 * taps + 1;
00026     m_tapLen = taplen;
00027     int fftlen = lrint(pow(2.0, ceil(log(taplen * 5) / log(2.0))));
00028     fftlen = std::max(64, fftlen);
00029     m_fftLen = fftlen;
00030     m_pBufR = (double*)fftw_malloc(sizeof(double) * fftlen);
00031     m_pBufC = (fftw_complex*)fftw_malloc(sizeof(fftw_complex) * (fftlen / 2 + 1));
00032     m_firWnd.resize(fftlen / 2 + 1);
00033     m_rdftplan = fftw_plan_dft_r2c_1d(fftlen, m_pBufR, m_pBufC, FFTW_ESTIMATE);
00034     m_ridftplan = fftw_plan_dft_c2r_1d(fftlen, m_pBufC, m_pBufR, FFTW_ESTIMATE);
00035     
00036     double omega = M_PI * bandwidth;
00037     for(int i = 0; i < fftlen; i++)
00038         m_pBufR[i] = 0.0;
00039     double z = 0.0;
00040     for(int i = -taps; i <= taps; i++) {
00041         double x = i * omega;
00042         //sinc(x) * Hamming window
00043         double y = (i == 0) ? 1.0 : (sin(x)/x);
00044         y *= 0.54 + 0.46*cos(M_PI*(double)i/taps);
00045         m_pBufR[(fftlen + i) % fftlen] = y;
00046         z += y;
00047     }
00048     //scaling sum into unity
00049     //shift center freq
00050     double omega_c = 2 * M_PI * center;
00051     for(int i = -taps; i <= taps; i++) {
00052         m_pBufR[(fftlen + i) % fftlen] *= cos(omega_c * i) / (z * (double)(fftlen));
00053     }
00054     
00055     fftw_execute(m_rdftplan);
00056     
00057     for(int i = 0; i < (int)m_firWnd.size(); i++) {
00058         m_firWnd[i] = m_pBufC[i][0];
00059     }
00060 }
00061 FIR::~FIR() {
00062     fftw_destroy_plan(m_rdftplan);
00063     fftw_destroy_plan(m_ridftplan);
00064     fftw_free(m_pBufR);
00065     fftw_free(m_pBufC);
00066 }
00067 void
00068 FIR::exec(const double *src, double *dst, int len) {
00069     for(int ss = 0; ss < len; ss += (int)m_fftLen - m_tapLen * 2) {
00070         for(int i = 0; i < m_fftLen; i++) {
00071             int j = ss + i - m_tapLen;
00072             if(j < 0)
00073                 j = std::min(-j - 1, len - 1);
00074             if(j >= len)
00075                 j = std::max(2 * len - 1 - j, 0);
00076             m_pBufR[i] = src[j];
00077         }
00078         fftw_execute(m_rdftplan);
00079         for(int i = 0; i < (int)m_firWnd.size(); i++) {
00080             m_pBufC[i][0] = m_pBufC[i][0] * m_firWnd[i];
00081             m_pBufC[i][1] = m_pBufC[i][1] * m_firWnd[i];
00082         }
00083         fftw_execute(m_ridftplan);
00084         for(int i = m_tapLen; i < m_fftLen - m_tapLen; i++) {
00085             int j = ss + i - m_tapLen;
00086             if((j < 0) || (j >= len))
00087                 continue;
00088             else
00089                 dst[j] = m_pBufR[i];
00090         }
00091     }
00092 }
